      • removeApartment

        public void removeApartment(short floor,
                            short num)
                     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Remove all resident from the apartment and them remove the apartment is self.
        Parameters:
        floor - the floor of the apartment to be removed
        num - the number, on the floor, of the apartment to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if there is no apartment instanced with those numbers (floor and num)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the floor or the num are not valid

      • removeResident

        public void removeResident(Resident res)
                    throws RemoveException
        Remove a resident from it's apartment. If there is no one else on the apartment after the removal, then remove also the apartment.
        Parameters:
        res - the resident to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the floor or the num are not valid
        RemoveException

      • addResident

        public void addResident(Resident res)
        Add a new resident to it's apartment, if it is the first resident, then also creates the new apartment The information about the number and floor of the apartment is in the resident object
        Parameters:
        res - the resident that should be added to the apartment

      • sendBill

        public void sendBill(Bill bill)
        Send a request of bill to all the residents on each apartment. Calls the doAccounting passing bill. Calls the doReportOfMonths passing bill.
        Parameters:
        bill - the bill that has to be charged

      • listResidents

        public java.lang.String listResidents(boolean hasGar)
        Show all the residents that has ou not a garage, dependes on the paramter
        Parameters:
        hasGar - if it is true, then show the residents that have a garage else show the ones that doesn't have
